sentences.en: Buying a house is an important transaction for most people.
sentences.cn: 买房子对大多数人来讲都是件重要的事.

sentences.en: He attends to the transaction of important business himself.
sentences.cn: 他亲自料理重要的生意.

sentences.en: He had expressed shame for a past transaction of his life.
sentences.cn: 他对过去那件事表示了羞愧.

sentences.en: He pocketed a hundred dollars on the transaction.
sentences.cn: 在这笔交易中他侵吞了100美元.

sentences.en: He was always in the middle of a business transaction.
He was twenty dollars in pocket by the transaction.
sentences.cn: 他在这笔生意中赚了20美元.

sentences.en: If you do go into the red you get charged 30p for each transaction.
sentences.cn: 如果你真的出现透支，那你每笔交易要支付30便士的费用。

sentences.en: In view of our longstanding business relationship, we can conclude the transaction.
sentences.cn: 鉴于你我双方的长期贸易关系, 我们可以做成这笔交易.

sentences.en: Let's congratulate ourselves that this transaction has been made.
sentences.cn: 让我们祝贺这次交易圆满成功.

sentences.en: Neither side would disclose details of the transaction.
sentences.cn: 双方均不肯披露交易细节。

sentences.en: Private transaction in the land and its products was allowed.
sentences.cn: 土地和土地产品的私人交易也得到允许.

sentences.en: The bank charges a fixed rate for each transaction.
sentences.cn: 银行对每一笔业务收取固定费用。

sentences.en: The space required per sales transaction also plays an important role.
sentences.cn: 每笔交易所需要的空间也起很大作用.

sentences.en: the transaction of his public duties
There are no flies on this transaction.
sentences.cn: 这是件无可指责的交易.

sentences.en: They were uncertain of the total value of the transaction.
sentences.cn: 他们还不确定这笔交易的总价值是多少。

sentences.en: We have brought this transaction to a successful conclusion.
sentences.cn: 我们已成功地达成了协议.

words.tran_cn: 办理人；做交易的人；处理者
[贸易]交易；[计]事务；办理；会报，[图情]学报

phrases.tran_cn: 金融业务；财务交易，财务事项
关联方交易；集团内交易；内幕交易
事务处理服务；事务处理业务

trans.tran_cn: 交易，业务，事务，办理，处理，（一笔）交易，（一项）事务，（学会等的）会议记录，学报
trans.tran_en: a business deal or action, such as buying or selling something
